sent.orig: Or can you remind remind them?
sent.trans: 或者你们可以提醒提醒他们？

sent.orig: We must remind ourselves from time to time so as to not lost our bearings.
sent.trans: 我必须时不时地提醒自己，以不至于让自己迷失最初的方向。

sent.orig: We write to remind you to send us your samples.
sent.trans: 我们来信是为了提醒你们把货样寄来。

sent.orig: The lovely Mickey Mouse doesn't remind people of the unfavourable images of mice and rats.
sent.trans: 可爱的米老鼠并没有让人们想起老鼠那不好的形象。

sent.orig: But before exploding, it will remind you by vibrating and flashing.
sent.trans: 但在爆炸之前，它会以振动或闪灯来提醒你。
